abstract: FYI column answers question regarding veracity of 1910 autobiography The Book of Daniel Drew, Bouck White novel about 19th century Wall Street schemer.

headline.print_headline: The Fable of a Wall Street Titan, Invented by a Character Just as Peculiar
headline.main: The Fable of a Wall Street Titan, Invented by a Character Just as Peculiar

snippet: “The Book of Daniel Drew” is a fictional account of a real-life financier, and the biography of its author, Bouck White, is equally outlandish.
lead_paragraph: “The Book of Daniel Drew” is a fictional account of a real-life financier, and the biography of its author, Bouck White, is equally outlandish.
